body: The following are new abilities that can be applied to animated objects, whether created by the animate objects spell or with the Craft Construct feat. Adding to these abilities requires the expenditure of Construction Points (CP), as described in the Animated Object description.
name: New Animated Object Abilities
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities

sections.body: Increase the threat range for the animated object's melee attacks by 1 or the threat multiplier by 1. This cannot combine with itself or with the piercing attack or slashing attack object abilities.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Augmented Critical (Ex/1 CP)
sections.name: Augmented Critical (Ex, 1 CP)

sections.body: The object gains +5 feet of reach with one melee attack. Increase reach on all attacks for an additional +1 CP.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Exceptional Reach (Ex/1 CP)
sections.name: Exceptional Reach (Ex, 1 CP)

sections.body: All the animated object's melee or ranged attacks do damage as though it were one size category larger. A crafter must purchase Improved Attack separately for melee and ranged attacks.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Improved Attack (Ex/1 CP)
sections.name: Improved Attack (Ex, 1 CP)

sections.body: Replace one melee attack with an attack that does the same amount of piercing damage and has a ×3 multiplier. Replace all melee attacks for an additional +1 CP. Object abilities that specify slam attacks do not work on piercing attacks.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Piercing Attack (Ex/1 CP)
sections.name: Piercing Attack (Ex, 1 CP)

sections.body: Replace one slam attack with a ranged attack. It does the same amount of damage, and has a range of 20 feet. Replace all attacks for an additional +2 CP. Object abilities that specify slam attacks do not work on ranged attacks.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Ranged Attack (Ex/2 CP)
sections.name: Ranged Attack (Ex, 2 CP)

sections.body: Replace one slam attack with an attack that does slashing damage and has either a 19–20 threat range (for blade-like attacks) or a ×3 threat multiplier (for axe- or scythelike attacks). Replace all melee attacks for an additional +1 CP. Object abilities that specify slam attacks do not work on slashing attacks.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Slashing Attack (Ex/1 CP)
sections.name: Slashing Attack (Ex, 1 CP)

sections.body: The object gains the trip special ability with one of its slam attacks.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Trip (Ex/2 CP)
sections.name: Trip (Ex, 2 CP)
